title: What Is the Ninth House in Astrology? Interpreting Your Ninth House

steps.title: The Ninth House is the House of Philosophy and Higher Learning.
steps.content: The Ninth House is the House of Philosophy and Higher Learning. This house motivates you to see the world with an open mind and a sense of adventure. It governs all forms of learning, including pursuing a college degree, reading and studying in your own time, and lessons of self-discovery. The house's ties to philosophy encourage you to mull over questions of law and ethics so that you can develop your own moral compass and set of principles. [1] X Research source The Ninth House motivates you to travel and explore other places. It also guides you to keep an open mind regarding other cultural practices as you do so. This house also represents international relations, generational family ties (like grandkids and grandparents), and spirituality.

steps.title: That depends on where it's placed in your birth chart.
steps.content: That depends on where it's placed in your birth chart. Upon the moment you were born, the stars and planets were positioned in a specific location in the sky. Your birth chart interprets these placements and where they fall on the zodiac calendar, which is separated into 12 different houses. The exact location of the Ninth House in your birth chart reveals how the house influences your life. To find where the Ninth House is placed in your chart, search online for a free birth chart calculator. To get the most accurate birth chart, you'll need to submit your birthday, birth city (the city in which you were born), and your exact birth time. [2] X Research source

steps.title: The planet Jupiter rules the Ninth House.
steps.content: The planet Jupiter rules the Ninth House. This planet symbolizes wisdom, growth, and morality. Jupiter's influence on the Ninth House encourages you to keep an open mind and learn from your experiences. The planet's association with growth also represents money, power, and your purpose in life. Its presence in the Ninth House helps you recognize your own ethics and principles so you can reach your full potential. [3] X Research source Jupiter calls you to expand your mind and learn from people who might have different views than you. The planet also encourages you to determine your guiding principles in life, like your moral code and sense of right and wrong.

steps.title: Sagittarius is the zodiac sign that rules the Ninth House.
steps.content: Sagittarius is the zodiac sign that rules the Ninth House. This sign is associated with wanderlust, adventure, and philosophy. Sagittarius influences the Ninth House by calling you to explore new places and ideas. The sign encourages you to welcome change in your life, whether that be a move to a new place or a fresh perspective on politics and spirituality. [4] X Research source Sagittarius's effect on the Ninth House calls you to realize that it's never too late to reinvent yourself. You can always change your mind, your looks, and even the place you call home. Sagittarius also motivates you to explore. Its influence will make you want to travel to a new city or curl up with a book set in a place you've never been (maybe even a fantasy world).

steps.title: Aries in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Aries in the Ninth House: You possess strong convictions and likely value your political, philosophical, and spiritual views. In order to feel truly fulfilled, it's important that you constantly seek new experiences and opportunities to learn. That way, you'll never grow stagnant or bored with your day-to-day life.

steps.title: Taurus in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Taurus in the Ninth House: You feel especially connected to the physical world and things that can ground you, like family, home, and material goods. You'll feel happiest if you cultivate a stable home life, whether that be starting a family or keeping your apartment well-decorated and cozy. Just try not to get too set in your ways. You'll learn to enjoy life's unexpected nature if you keep an open mind.

steps.title: Gemini in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Gemini in the Ninth House: You are an excellent communicator, and you learn a lot through your insightful, interesting conversations with others. To make sure that you glean everything you can from these interactions, stay focused on one conversation at a time. That way, you won't get overwhelmed.

steps.title: Cancer in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Cancer in the Ninth House: You feel and experience life deeply. To feel truly content, you'll benefit from dedicating time to self-discovery. Journal, talk through your emotions with your loved ones, and fill your life with enriching new experiences. It will help you gain a sense of clarity and calm regarding your feelings.

steps.title: Leo in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Leo in the Ninth House: You are able to express your personal opinions in a bold and captivating fashion. You thrive when given the opportunity to travel, meet new people, and share your beliefs with others. Just remember to give other people space to share their beliefs, too. You might be surprised by how much you can learn from other people, especially if they have different views than you. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Virgo in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Virgo in the Ninth House: You have a brilliant mind that you are always striving to use for good. Your life's purpose likely involves serving others, whether that be working in the non-profit industry or lending a helping hand to your friends, family, and community. When moments of self-doubt appear, know that you don't have to be perfect to make a positive impact on the world. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Libra in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Libra in the Ninth House: You are always striving to bring harmony to your relationships with friends, family, and people you're dating. To make sure you're happy and fulfilled in these relationships (and in life), remember that your opinion matters, too. Try not to linger too much on what other people think and have faith in your own judgment.

steps.title: Scorpio in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Scorpio in the Ninth House: You're driven to learn about subjects that may be peculiar or frightening, and that's because you're not afraid of the unknown. It's a wonderful quality to possess, and you'll be happiest if you follow wherever your mind takes you. Just remind yourself to share your illuminating discoveries with other people, as you'll benefit from connecting with others about your interests.

steps.title: Sagittarius in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Sagittarius in the Ninth House: Your sign rules the Ninth House, which makes you most suited for its freewheeling adventures. You are happiest when you're given the opportunity to explore, whether that be through travel or literature, and you like sharing the lessons you've learned along the way. Remember to listen to what others have to say, and let them guide the discussion every now and then. There's a lot you can learn from other people!

steps.title: Capricorn in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Capricorn in the Ninth House: You possess an admirable amount of ambition and the unique ability to make your goals a reality. As an earth sign, you ground yourself with a realist perspective and concrete plans. It might help you to realize that you're allowed to dream a little, too (even if it doesn't seem realistic).

steps.title: Aquarius in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Aquarius in the Ninth House: You're no stranger to sticking out from the crowd, and it's possible you have big dreams that few possess or know how to make a reality. You'll be able to accomplish anything you set your mind to if you take the time to come up with a plan and stick to it. Even the most spontaneous people need a blueprint every now and then.

steps.title: Pisces in the Ninth House:
steps.content: Pisces in the Ninth House: Your sensitive and poetic nature makes you prone to dreaming. You might feel like you've got a mission to fulfill in your lifetime, whether that be serving others or dedicating yourself to research. If you haven't found your calling just yet, allow yourself to explore, meet new people, and keep an open mind. It will come to you in time.
